features: BATMAN ADVENTURES ACTION FIGURES: Collect the 12-inch Batman Adventures, Batman and The Joker figures with 12 armor accessories and 17 points of articulation for dynamic poses and action!
12 ARMOR ACCESSORIES: Armor up Batman and Joker with 12 interchangeable armor pieces, including iconic Batman gear, belt, cane, blasters, and more - providing endless looks!
AUTHENTIC COMIC STYLING: Featuring comic-inspired styling, incredible details and a meticulous sculpt that brings the Batman figures to life!
EXPAND YOUR BATMAN ADVENTURES: Build your Batman collection with the Batman Adventures Batman vs The Joker Action Figures Set, Batcycle and Batman Action Figure for more imaginative play!

PERFECT GIFTS FOR KIDS: Inspire creativity and imagination with Batman toy figures & playsets! Ideal for children who love Super Hero adventures, these superhero toys fosters pretend play and storytelling!
Covered by the Spin Master Care Commitment. See below for full details
body.description: Introducing the Batman Adventures, Batman vs The Joker Action Figure Set! This action-packed Batman figure is perfect for kids and collectors who wants to dive into the exciting world of Batman toys! With an impressive 17 points of articulation, the highly detailed and articulated 12-inch Batman Adventures figures can effortlessly strike heroic poses. Kids can be creative and customize Batman and The Joker with 12 unique and interchangeable armor accessories. Mix and match these armor pieces to create endless looks! The authentic comic-styling, detailed sculpt and design captures makes the Batman vs The Joker Set a must-have for any Batman collection! Build your Batman collection with the Batman Adventures Batman vs The Joker Action Figures Set, Batcycle and Batman Action Figure for more imaginative play! Assemble your ultimate team of Super Heroes and Super-Villains! These toys for girls and boys toys are perfect for kids that love Justice League figurines, DC multiverse, Super Hero movies collectibles, RC cars, and more! The Batman Adventures, Batman vs The Joker Action Figure Set inspires creative storytelling, problem-solving, and bravery as kids create their own Batman adventures!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great toy. My son loves it, great quality and size!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My nephew LOVED this for Christmas. The figures come with outfits/ gear and the limbs bend. Definitely worth buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These 12 inch Batman vs Joker figure set is really awesome and a great value. Not only do they look super but they are well made and sturdy so they'll be able to handle hours of playtime. Each figure comes with 5 accessories each with Batman having armour to add to his Batsuit and the Joker comes with a cane, cards, a cane as well as a jacket and hat. I highly recommend this figure set for any children and collectors alike. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Batman Joker set
reviews.reviewText: I gave them as a Christmas gift to my 4 year old nephew he loved them they was good size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a gift for my son in a couple months so I haven't opened it. But everything looks perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect gift for my son. He loves that he can add the armor to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you collect Joker stuff then get it.
reviews.reviewText: I only bought it for the Joker. I was not let down. He's a very cool addition to the collection for a very small price. Just give the Batman away to charity or something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great decision on me buying this one! Out of all the Christmas gifts , he played with this one the most!

reviews.reviewTitle: These are a great size for Batman Fans
reviews.reviewText: I bought for a serious Batman collector as just a fun addition and they love them !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am delighted with this set. I have added it to my collection.

Ich bin sehr zufrieden mit dem Spin Master Batman Adventures Batman vs The Joker Action-Figuren Set. Die Figuren sind optisch ansprechend gestaltet, und die Bemalung ist wirklich gut umgesetzt. Die Möglichkeit, die Figuren vollständig zu bewegen, ermöglicht spannende Rollenspiele.Das mitgelieferte Zubehör ist vielfältig, jedoch manchmal etwas schwer anzulegen. Dies könnte für Kinder ab 4 Jahren eine kleine Herausforderung darstellen. Dennoch überzeugt das Set insgesamt durch eine hervorragende Preis-Leistung. Für Batman-Fans ist dieses Spielzeug definitiv eine Empfehlung wert!
